title: Man hospitalized after accidental shooting in Greendale Township
content:
A 57-year-old Greendale Township man was hospitalized after an accident shooting that occurred Saturday morning.
The man admitted himself to the MidMichigan Medical Center-Midland Emergency Room for treatment, and deputies were called.
The man stated he was carrying a .22-caliber revolver in an open holster slung over his shoulder. The pistol slipped out of the holster and struck the floor on its hammer, causing a round to discharge. The man was struck in his abdomen.
The media log entry notes the man was sober, and apologetic to the medical staff for the mistake.
